title: Update the Newsroom's Style Guide
description: A new term has entered the public lexicon. A senior editor must decide on the correct spelling and usage and add it to the internal style guide.

tasks.description: Research how other major publications and style guides (like AP, Chicago) are treating the new term.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers information on the prevailing industry standard.

tasks.description: Make a decision on the official house style for the term.
Add the new entry to the internal style guide document and notify all editorial staff of the update.
tasks.expected_outcome: The style guide is updated and the change is communicated to the team.
